Click the button to Sell Your Crops Welcome Farmer Details Crop Detailsstring> Register Farmer Schemes Money Transaction Add Bank Account Check Balance Kissan Rakshak, an application exclusively developed for the welfare of Indian Farmers.It uses crowd Funding technique to fund farmers with money required to cultivate their crops.The Farmers are given a chance to return the borrowed amount with their yield rather than money. JAI KISSAN!!

Transactions will be completed only if the user has provided Bank Details
All the necessary documents need to be verified and updated
Requested amount will not be sanctioned if bank details or documents provided are found to be false
Proofs to be submitted for every disaster/crop failure that occured in your land
